name: Samurai Shodown (itch)
description:
STORY One days, the young man received a parcel from unknown person, and he doesn't know who has sent this parcel, so he unpacks this. In the parcel it has an old video game. Right now, he's very wonder then he decides to link this video game to TV. He plays it. When he during choose character, the monitor was freezing so he gets up and go to monitor for checking. He is slapping on monitor around 3 times and then have bright light, so he put hand up to block the light. When the light fades down, he put hand down and he saw everything has change. He's very confused what's happened with him, but he just thinks he must escape from this game. So, this adventure was begun.

                     

  • ← → : Movement
  • Spacebar : Jump
  • Z : Attack
